text: Aerenea periscelifera is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Thomson in 1868. It is known from Colombia and Brazil.BioLib.cz - Aerenea periscelifera. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Compsosomatini Category:Beetles of South America Category:Insects of Brazil Category:Arthropods of Colombia Category:Beetles described in 1868
title: Aerenea periscelifera
